Koga Shuko/Anubis/Hades/Unitron/Sixshot/Serpentor:



Koga Shuko transformed to his jet fighter mode, Anubis going to his jackle 
mode.  Hades transformed into his 30 ft long mutant worm mode, this mode 
genetically altered to dig through things.

(Interesting note, Hades being the ancient Greek god of death, is a worm in 
this, usually worms help to break down flesh on rotting corpses).  Lifting up 
into the air on a section of itself, Hades smashed into the ground in his 
current mode, easily drilling through the ground.

Sixshot transformed to his ramming tank mode, smashing against the blocked 
cave easily.  Rocks cracked, a third of the way through.  Activating his 
flame throwers, he fired, letting rocks slowly crumble, relatively quickly 
breaking through with superior firepower.

Serpentor transformed to his 30 ft long snake mode, slowly following Hades.

Unitron transformed to his jet fighter mode, getting a lock and firing two 
missiles after Sixshot had moved, blowing a hole in the blocked cave after 
other missiles had hit.  A 3 ft high, 5 ft wide hole in the cliff was broken 
open.
